engine.main

Class GameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.main.GameObject

  • public abstract class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for all GameObjects in the game.
    Author:
    Taylor Houthoofd

    • Method Detail

      • instantiation

        private void instantiation()
        Instantiates various instantiations, and calculates center of mass.

      • startUpdate

        void startUpdate()
        Updates all object components, then updates object.

      • getDrawLevel

        public int getDrawLevel()
        Returns the draw layer of the object.
        Returns:
        draw layer

      • setDrawLevel

        public void setDrawLevel(int level)
        Sets the draw layer of the object. Lower draw levels get drawn to the screen before higher ones.
        Parameters:
        level - draw level

      • getPos

        public Coord getPos()
        Gets the position of the object.
        Returns:
        position

      • setPos

        public void setPos(Coord newPos)
        Sets the position of the object and recalculates center of mass.
        Parameters:
        newPos - new position of object

      • setPos

        public void setPos(java.awt.Point newPos)
        Sets the position of the object and recalculates center of mass.
        Parameters:
        newPos - new position of object

      • setPos

        public void setPos(double x,
                   double y)
        Sets the position of the object and recalculates center of mass.
        Parameters:
        x - new x position
        y - new y position

      • incPos

        public void incPos(double x,
                   double y)
        Increments the position of the object and recalculates center of mass.
        Parameters:
        x - how far to move x
        y - how far to move y

      • getCom

        public Coord getCom()
        Returns the object's center of mass.
        Returns:
        center of mass

      • getSize

        public java.awt.Dimension getSize()
        Returns the object's size.
        Returns:
        size

      • getTags

        public java.lang.String[] getTags()
        Gets all String tags associated with this object.
        Returns:
        tags

      • containsTag

        public boolean containsTag(java.lang.String tag)
        Checks to see if this object is associated with a String tag.
        Parameters:
        tag - tag to check
        Returns:
        true if contained

      • isTouching

        boolean isTouching(java.awt.Point point)
        Checks whether or not a point lies within the bounds of an object.
        Parameters:
        point - point to check
        Returns:
        true if yes

      • addObjectController

        void addObjectController(ObjectController controller)
        Adds the object controller to the game object. Allows for object to remove itself and get other objects.
        Parameters:
        controller - Object controller

      • kill

        public void kill()
        Removes this object from the game's active objects. Generates an onDestroy event for the object.

      • Render

        public void Render(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Renders the object to the screen using its SpriteGraphic object. If SpriteGraphic is not set up, kills the object.
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics object used to render to screen.

      • triggerEvent

        public void triggerEvent(GameObject sender,
                         GameEvent e)
        Triggers an event for this object. Calls the onEvent method for this object's event listener.
        Parameters:
        sender - GameObject calling the method
        e - GameEvent being sent

      • setClickable

        public void setClickable(boolean clickable)
        Sets whether this object will trigger an event when clicked.
        Parameters:
        clickable - generate event

      • addGameEventListener

        protected void addGameEventListener(GameEventListener listener)
        Adds a GameEventListener for this GameObject. The listener's onEvent method is called whenever an event for this object is triggered.
        Parameters:
        listener - GameEventListener to add

      • addComponent

        protected void addComponent(GameComponent c)
        Adds a GameComponent to this object.
        Parameters:
        c - GameComponent to add

      • addTag

        protected void addTag(java.lang.String tag)
        Adds a String tag to be associated with this object.
        Parameters:
        tag - tag to associate

      • removeTag

        protected void removeTag(java.lang.String tag)
        Removes a tag from this object.
        Parameters:
        tag - tag to remove

      • recalcCom

        private void recalcCom()
        Recalculates this object's center of mass.

      • Update

        public abstract void Update()
        Called every frame. Used to make the object do what it does.
